alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1246 PM EDT/1146 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southeast of Marianna to 10 miles southwest of Blountstown. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Selman, Abe Springs, Rosedale, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Clio, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga and Alliance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
